text: James "Jay" Carney (born May 22, 1965) is an American journalist. He was the 28th White House Press Secretary. He worked for President Barack Obama's cabinet. His term began in February 2011. He resigned (decided to start working in a new place) in May 2014 and left office in June 2014. He was succeeded by Josh Earnest. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:White House Press Secretaries Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
title: Jay Carney
